alert.note: Alert for Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 11:04PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Throckmorton County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1103 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Throckmorton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Throckmorton, Woodson, Elbert, Lusk, Us-183 Near The Throckmorton- Baylor County Line, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us- 283 and The Intersection Of Us-283 And Ranch Road 209. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
